thread.title: OktozuLite Puzzle Game Now Available for Free Download in Apples App Store

author: PR.com
title: OktozuLite Puzzle Game Now Available for Free Download in Apples App Store
text:
OktozuLite Puzzle Game Now Available for Free Download in Apples App Store
Apeirocoup LLC Releases Free Game OktozuLite for iPhone & iPad.
Carmel, IN, September 04, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Apeirocoup LLC today announced that their game application, OktozuLite, is now available for free download exclusively for iPhone and iPad. OktozuLite is the free lite version of the Oktozu game that was released in May this year.
OktozuLite features 100 exciting levels providing players of all ages with endless hours of fun, challenges and excitement. Each level is a whole new adventure with different brick formation and challenges. Player’s mission is to free frozen Oktozus trapped within the ice bricks and destroy falling asteroids. OktozuLite is sure to bring sweat, tears, and smiles to its players.
“We are incredibly excited about our game OktozuLite,” said Li Lin, CEO of Apeirocoup LLC. “Each level is an amazing whole new adventure with excitingly unique formation for players to solve the puzzle.”
Apeirocoup LLC is an application development company for mobile devices. Based in Carmel, Indiana, the company was founded in 2012 by founder and current CEO Li Lin. We strive to improve lifestyles of our users and help to make life more fun, enjoyable, convenient and productive with our applications.
